line_1: Her fairest garlands round PERUVIA'S shrines;
line_2: And see, IBERIA bleeds! while Vict'ry twines

line_1: So heroes, taught by doubtful shrines,
And to avert her fate seek holy shrines
line_2: As still consumed with vain desire she pines;

line_1: And to avert her fate seek holy shrines
line_2: The threatened ills to learn by auguries and signs.

line_1: Less sacred far those tinsel shrines,
And with her presence gilds the long-neglected shrines.
line_2: Again, in genuine purity she shines,
